definition: A knitted garment worn on the upper part of the body.
example: It's cold, so I'm wearing a warm sweater.
koChirpScript: sweater. 스웨터라는 뜻입니다. It's cold, so I'm wearing a warm sweater. 추워서 따뜻한 스웨터를 입고 있어요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: To propel the body through water by using the limbs.
example: I like to swim in the ocean.
koChirpScript: swim. 수영하다라는 뜻입니다. I like to swim in the ocean. 저는 바다에서 수영하는 것을 좋아해요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: The sport or activity of propelling oneself through water using the limbs.
example: Swimming is good exercise.
koChirpScript: swimming. 수영이라는 뜻입니다. Swimming is good exercise. 수영은 좋은 운동이에요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A piece of furniture with a flat top and one or more legs.
example: The keys are on the table.
koChirpScript: table. 탁자 또는 테이블이라는 뜻입니다. The keys are on the table. 열쇠가 탁자 위에 있어요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: To reach for and hold something in one's hands; to carry something from one place to another.
example: Please take this book with you.
koChirpScript: take. 가져가다 또는 잡다라는 뜻입니다. Please take this book with you. 이 책을 가져가세요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: To speak in order to give information or express ideas or feelings.
example: Can I talk to you for a minute?
koExample: 잠깐 얘기 좀 할 수 있을까요?
koChirpScript: talk. 말하다 또는 이야기하다라는 뜻입니다. Can I talk to you for a minute? 잠깐 얘기 좀 할 수 있을까요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: Of great or more than average height, especially (with reference to an object) relative to width.
example: He is a tall man.
koChirpScript: tall. 키가 큰 이라는 뜻입니다. He is a tall man. 그는 키가 큰 남자입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A motor vehicle licensed to transport passengers in return for payment of a fare.
example: Let's take a taxi to the airport.
koChirpScript: taxi. 택시라는 뜻입니다. Let's take a taxi to the airport. 공항까지 택시를 타자. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A hot drink made by infusing the dried crushed leaves of the tea plant in boiling water.
example: Would you like a cup of tea?
koChirpScript: tea. 차라는 뜻입니다. Would you like a cup of tea? 차 한잔 하시겠어요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: To impart knowledge to or instruct (someone) as to how to do something.
example: She teaches English to young children.
koChirpScript: teach. 가르치다라는 뜻입니다. She teaches English to young children. 그녀는 어린 아이들에게 영어를 가르칩니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A person who teaches, especially in a school.
example: My teacher is very kind.
koChirpScript: teacher. 선생님이라는 뜻입니다. My teacher is very kind. 우리 선생님은 매우 친절하십니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A group of players forming one side in a competitive game or sport.
example: Which football team do you support?
koChirpScript: team. 팀이라는 뜻입니다. Which football team do you support? 어느 축구팀을 응원하세요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: A person aged between 13 and 19 years.
example: My brother is a teenager.
koChirpScript: teenager. 십대라는 뜻입니다. My brother is a teenager. 제 남동생은 십대입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A system for transmitting voices over a distance using wire or radio; to contact (someone) using the telephone.
example: The telephone is ringing.
koChirpScript: telephone. 전화기라는 명사와 전화하다라는 동사로 쓰입니다. The telephone is ringing. 전화기가 울리고 있어요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A system for transmitting visual images and sound that are reproduced on screens, chiefly used to broadcast programs for entertainment, information, and education.
example: I like watching television in the evening.
koExample: 저는 저녁에 텔레비전 보는 것을 좋아해요.
koChirpScript: television. 텔레비전이라는 뜻입니다. I like watching television in the evening. 저는 저녁에 텔레비전 보는 것을 좋아해요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Communicate information, facts, or news to someone in spoken or written words.
example: Can you tell me the time?
koChirpScript: tell. 말하다라는 뜻입니다. Can you tell me the time? 시간 좀 알려주시겠어요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: Equivalent to the product of two and five; one more than nine; 10.
example: I have ten fingers.
koChirpScript: ten. 숫자 10을 의미합니다. I have ten fingers. 저는 손가락이 열 개 있습니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A game in which two or four players strike a ball with rackets over a net stretched across a court.
example: Let's play tennis on Saturday.
koChirpScript: tennis. 테니스라는 뜻입니다. Let's play tennis on Saturday. 토요일에 테니스 치자. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Extremely bad or serious.
example: The weather was terrible yesterday.
koChirpScript: terrible. 끔찍한 또는 형편없는 이라는 뜻입니다. The weather was terrible yesterday. 어제 날씨가 끔찍했어요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A procedure intended to establish the quality, performance, or reliability of something; to take measures to check the quality, performance, or reliability of (something).
example: We have a math test tomorrow.
koChirpScript: test. 시험이라는 명사와 시험하다라는 동사로 쓰입니다. We have a math test tomorrow. 우리는 내일 수학 시험이 있어요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A book or other written or printed work, regarded in terms of its content rather than its physical form.
example: Please read the text on page 20.
koChirpScript: text. 본문 또는 글이라는 뜻입니다. Please read the text on page 20. 20페이지의 본문을 읽어주세요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Used to introduce the second element in a comparison.
example: She is taller than her brother.
koChirpScript: than. 무엇무엇보다 라는 뜻으로, 비교할 때 씁니다. She is taller than her brother. 그녀는 남동생보다 키가 더 큽니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: To express gratitude to (someone).
example: I want to thank you for your help.
koChirpScript: thank. 감사하다라는 뜻입니다. I want to thank you for your help. 도와주셔서 감사합니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: An expression of gratitude.
example: Thanks for the gift!
koChirpScript: thanks. 고맙다는 뜻의 감탄사 또는 감사라는 뜻의 명사입니다. Thanks for the gift! 선물 고마워요! 라는 의미네요.

definition: Used to identify a specific person or thing observed by the speaker.
example: Look at that car.
koGloss: det. 저; pron. 저것; conj. ~라는 것
koChirpScript: that. 저, 저것, 또는 ~라는 것 이라는 뜻으로 다양하게 쓰입니다. Look at that car. 저 차 좀 봐. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Used to denote particular, specified persons or things.
example: The sun is shining.
koChirpScript: the. '그'라는 뜻의 정관사입니다. 특정한 것을 가리킬 때 씁니다. The sun is shining. 해가 빛나고 있다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A building or outdoor area in which plays and other dramatic performances are given.
example: We are going to the theater tonight.
koExample: 우리는 오늘 밤에 극장에 갈 거예요.
koChirpScript: theater. 극장이라는 뜻입니다. We are going to the theater tonight. 우리는 오늘 밤에 극장에 갈 거예요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Belonging to or associated with the people or things previously mentioned or easily identified.
example: This is their house.
koChirpScript: their. 그들의 라는 뜻의 소유격입니다. This is their house. 이것은 그들의 집입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Used as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to two or more people or things previously mentioned.
example: I saw them at the park.
koChirpScript: them. 그들을 이라는 뜻의 목적격 대명사입니다. I saw them at the park. 나는 공원에서 그들을 봤어요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: At that time; at the time in question.
example: First I'll go shopping, and then I'll go home.
koExample: 먼저 쇼핑을 하고, 그러고 나서 집에 갈 거예요.
koChirpScript: then. 그러고 나서 또는 그때 라는 뜻입니다. First I'll go shopping, and then I'll go home. 먼저 쇼핑을 하고, 그러고 나서 집에 갈 거예요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: In, at, or to that place or position.
example: Your bag is over there.
koChirpScript: there. 거기에 라는 뜻입니다. Your bag is over there. 네 가방은 저기 있어. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Used to refer to two or more people or things previously mentioned or easily identified.
example: They are my friends.
koChirpScript: they. 그들은 이라는 뜻의 주격 대명사입니다. They are my friends. 그들은 내 친구들이야. 라는 의미네요.

definition: An object, fact, or affair, not specified.
example: What is that thing on the table?
koChirpScript: thing. 것 또는 물건이라는 뜻입니다. What is that thing on the table? 탁자 위에 있는 저것은 무엇인가요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: To have a particular opinion, belief, or idea about someone or something.
example: I think it will rain tomorrow.
koChirpScript: think. 생각하다라는 뜻입니다. I think it will rain tomorrow. 내일 비가 올 것 같아요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Constituting number three in a sequence; 3rd.
example: This is my third visit to Korea.
koExample: 이번이 저의 세 번째 한국 방문입니다.
koChirpScript: third. 세 번째라는 뜻의 서수입니다. This is my third visit to Korea. 이번이 저의 세 번째 한국 방문입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Feeling a need to drink.
example: I am thirsty. Can I have some water?
koExample: 목이 말라요. 물 좀 마실 수 있을까요?
koChirpScript: thirsty. 목마른이라는 뜻입니다. I am thirsty. Can I have some water? 목이 말라요. 물 좀 마실 수 있을까요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: Equivalent to the sum of ten and three; one more than twelve; 13.
example: She is thirteen years old.
koChirpScript: thirteen. 숫자 13을 의미합니다. She is thirteen years old. 그녀는 13살입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Equivalent to the product of three and ten; 30.
example: There are thirty days in April.
koChirpScript: thirty. 숫자 30을 의미합니다. There are thirty days in April. 4월은 30일까지 있습니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Used to identify a specific person or thing close at hand or being indicated or experienced.
example: This is my house.
koChirpScript: this. 이 또는 이것 이라는 뜻입니다. This is my house. 이것은 우리 집입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: The number equivalent to the product of a hundred and ten; 1,000.
example: The ticket costs one thousand won.
koChirpScript: thousand. 숫자 1000을 의미합니다. The ticket costs one thousand won. 그 표는 천 원입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Equivalent to the sum of one and two; one more than two; 3.
example: I have three cats.
koChirpScript: three. 숫자 3을 의미합니다. I have three cats. 저는 고양이가 세 마리 있어요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Moving in one side and out of the other side of (an opening, channel, or location).
example: We walked through the park.
koChirpScript: through. 무엇무엇을 통하여 라는 뜻입니다. We walked through the park. 우리는 공원을 가로질러 걸었습니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: The day of the week before Friday and following Wednesday.
example: See you on Thursday.
koChirpScript: Thursday. 목요일이라는 뜻입니다. See you on Thursday. 목요일에 만나요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A piece of paper or small card that gives the holder a certain right, especially to enter a place, travel by public transport, or participate in an event.
example: I bought a ticket for the concert.
koChirpScript: ticket. 표 또는 티켓이라는 뜻입니다. I bought a ticket for the concert. 콘서트 표를 샀어요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: The indefinite continued progress of existence and events in the past, present, and future regarded as a whole.
example: What time is it?
koChirpScript: time. 시간이라는 뜻입니다. What time is it? 지금 몇 시예요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: In need of sleep or rest; weary.
example: I am very tired after a long day.
koChirpScript: tired. 피곤한이라는 뜻입니다. I am very tired after a long day. 긴 하루 끝에 매우 피곤해요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: The name of a book, composition, or other artistic work.
example: What is the title of this book?
koChirpScript: title. 제목이라는 뜻입니다. What is the title of this book? 이 책의 제목이 무엇인가요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: Expressing motion in the direction of (a particular location).
example: I am going to the store.
koChirpScript: to. ~로 라는 뜻의 전치사 또는 부정사를 만드는 데 쓰입니다. I am going to the store. 가게에 가는 중이에요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: On or in the course of this present day.
example: What are you doing today?
koChirpScript: today. 오늘이라는 뜻입니다. What are you doing today? 오늘 뭐 하세요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: With or in proximity to another person or people.
example: Let's study together.
koChirpScript: together. 함께 또는 같이 라는 뜻입니다. Let's study together. 같이 공부하자. 라는 의미네요.

definition: To rest your mind and body by closing your eyes and becoming unconscious.
example: I need to sleep for eight hours every night.
koChirpScript: sleep. 자다라는 뜻입니다. I need to sleep for eight hours every night. 나는 매일 밤 8시간을 자야 해요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Moving or operating at a low speed; not quick or fast.
example: This is a very slow train.
koChirpScript: slow. 느린이라는 뜻입니다. This is a very slow train. 이 기차는 매우 느려요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Of a size that is less than normal or usual.
example: I live in a small apartment.
koChirpScript: small. 작은이라는 뜻입니다. I live in a small apartment. 나는 작은 아파트에 살아요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Having or showing a quick-witted intelligence.
example: She is a very smart student.
koChirpScript: smart. 똑똑한이라는 뜻입니다. She is a very smart student. 그녀는 매우 똑똑한 학생입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A long limbless reptile that has no eyelids, a short tail, and jaws that are capable of considerable extension.
example: I am afraid of snakes.
koChirpScript: snake. 뱀이라는 뜻입니다. I am afraid of snakes. 나는 뱀을 무서워해요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Atmospheric water vapor frozen into ice crystals and falling in light white flakes; to fall as snow.
example: Look, it's starting to snow!
koChirpScript: snow. 눈이라는 명사와 눈이 오다라는 동사로 쓰입니다. Look, it's starting to snow! 봐, 눈이 오기 시작했어! 라는 의미네요.

definition: To such a great extent; and for this reason; therefore.
example: It was raining, so I took an umbrella.
koChirpScript: so. 매우라는 부사 또는 그래서라는 접속사로 쓰입니다. It was raining, so I took an umbrella. 비가 와서, 그래서 우산을 가져갔어요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: An unspecified amount or number of.
example: I need some help.
koChirpScript: some. 약간의 또는 몇몇 이라는 뜻입니다. I need some help. 도움이 좀 필요해요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Someone; an unspecified or unknown person.
example: Somebody is at the door.
koChirpScript: somebody. 누군가라는 뜻입니다. Somebody is at the door. 누군가 문 앞에 있어요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: An unspecified or unknown person.
example: Is someone there?
koChirpScript: someone. 누군가라는 뜻입니다. Is someone there? 거기 누구 있나요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: A thing that is unspecified or unknown.
example: I have something to tell you.
koChirpScript: something. 무언가라는 뜻입니다. I have something to tell you. 너에게 할 말이 있어. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Occasionally, rather than all of the time.
example: Sometimes I go to the cinema.
koChirpScript: sometimes. 때때로라는 뜻입니다. Sometimes I go to the cinema. 나는 때때로 영화관에 가요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A boy or man in relation to either or both of his parents.
example: He is my son.
koChirpScript: son. 아들이라는 뜻입니다. He is my son. 그는 제 아들입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A short poem or other set of words set to music or meant to be sung.
example: This is my favorite song.
koChirpScript: song. 노래라는 뜻입니다. This is my favorite song. 이것은 제가 가장 좋아하는 노래입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: In or after a short time.
example: I will be back soon.
koChirpScript: soon. 곧이라는 뜻입니다. I will be back soon. 곧 돌아올게요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Feeling distress, especially through sympathy with someone else's misfortune.
example: I'm sorry to hear that.
koChirpScript: sorry. 미안한이라는 뜻입니다. I'm sorry to hear that. 그 말을 들으니 유감입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Vibrations that travel through the air or another medium and can be heard when they reach a person's or animal's ear.
example: That sounds like a good idea.
koChirpScript: sound. 소리라는 명사와 ~처럼 들리다라는 동사로 쓰입니다. That sounds like a good idea. 그거 좋은 생각처럼 들리네요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A liquid dish, typically made by boiling ingredients in stock or water.
example: I'd like a bowl of tomato soup.
koChirpScript: soup. 수프라는 뜻입니다. I'd like a bowl of tomato soup. 토마토 수프 한 그릇 주세요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: The direction toward the point of the horizon 90 degrees clockwise from east.
example: Birds fly south for the winter.
koGloss: n. 남쪽; adj. 남쪽의; adv. 남쪽으로
koExample: 새들은 겨울을 나기 위해 남쪽으로 날아갑니다.
koChirpScript: south. 남쪽이라는 뜻입니다. Birds fly south for the winter. 새들은 겨울을 나기 위해 남쪽으로 날아갑니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A continuous area or expanse that is free, available, or unoccupied.
example: There is not enough space for a table.
koChirpScript: space. 공간이라는 뜻입니다. There is not enough space for a table. 테이블을 놓을 공간이 충분하지 않아요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Say something in order to convey information, an opinion, or a feeling.
example: Do you speak English?
koChirpScript: speak. 말하다라는 뜻입니다. Do you speak English? 영어를 할 줄 아세요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: Better, greater, or otherwise different from what is usual.
example: Today is a special day.
koChirpScript: special. 특별한이라는 뜻입니다. Today is a special day. 오늘은 특별한 날입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Write or name the letters that form (a word) in correct sequence.
example: How do you spell your name?
koChirpScript: spell. 철자를 말하다라는 뜻입니다. How do you spell your name? 이름 철자가 어떻게 되세요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: The process or activity of writing or naming the letters of a word.
example: My spelling is not very good.
koChirpScript: spelling. 철자법이라는 뜻입니다. My spelling is not very good. 저는 철자법에 약해요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Pay out (money) in buying or hiring goods or services.
example: How much did you spend?
koChirpScript: spend. 돈을 쓰다 또는 시간을 보내다라는 뜻입니다. How much did you spend? 얼마나 쓰셨어요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: An activity involving physical exertion and skill in which an individual or team competes against another or others for entertainment.
example: What's your favorite sport?
koChirpScript: sport. 스포츠 또는 운동이라는 뜻입니다. What's your favorite sport? 가장 좋아하는 스포츠가 뭐예요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: The season after winter and before summer, in which vegetation begins to appear.
example: I love the flowers in the spring.
koChirpScript: spring. 봄이라는 뜻입니다. I love the flowers in the spring. 저는 봄에 피는 꽃들을 사랑해요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Have or maintain an upright position, supported by one's feet.
example: Please stand up.
koChirpScript: stand. 서다라는 뜻입니다. Please stand up. 일어서 주세요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A fixed luminous point in the night sky that is a large, remote incandescent body like the sun.
example: Look at the stars!
koChirpScript: star. 별이라는 뜻입니다. Look at the stars! 별들을 보세요! 라는 의미네요.

definition: Begin or be reckoned from a particular point in time or space.
example: The movie starts at 7 p.m.
koChirpScript: start. 시작하다라는 뜻입니다. The movie starts at 7 p.m. 영화는 저녁 7시에 시작합니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A definite or clear expression of something in speech or writing.
example: The police took a statement from the witness.
koChirpScript: statement. 진술 또는 성명이라는 뜻입니다. The police took a statement from the witness. 경찰은 목격자로부터 진술을 받았습니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A place where a particular activity or service is based.
example: I'll meet you at the train station.
koChirpScript: station. 역 또는 정거장이라는 뜻입니다. I'll meet you at the train station. 기차역에서 만나요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Remain in the same place.
example: I'm going to stay at home tonight.
koChirpScript: stay. 머무르다라는 뜻입니다. I'm going to stay at home tonight. 오늘 밤은 집에 머무를 거예요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Up to and including the present or the time mentioned; even now (or then) as formerly.
example: Are you still here?
koChirpScript: still. 아직도 또는 여전히 라는 뜻입니다. Are you still here? 아직도 여기 있어요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: Come to an end; cease to happen.
example: Please stop talking.
koChirpScript: stop. 멈추다라는 동사와 정류장이라는 명사로 쓰입니다. Please stop talking. 말하는 것을 멈춰주세요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A place where things are sold.
example: I'm going to the store to buy some milk.
koChirpScript: store. 가게 또는 상점이라는 뜻입니다. I'm going to the store to buy some milk. 우유 사러 가게에 갈 거예요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: An account of imaginary or real people and events told for entertainment.
example: Tell me a story.
koChirpScript: story. 이야기라는 뜻입니다. Tell me a story. 이야기 하나 해주세요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A public road in a city or town, typically with houses and buildings on one or both sides.
example: My house is on this street.
koChirpScript: street. 거리 또는 길이라는 뜻입니다. My house is on this street. 우리 집은 이 거리에 있어요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Having the power to move heavy weights or perform other physically demanding tasks.
example: He is a strong man.
koChirpScript: strong. 힘센 또는 강한이라는 뜻입니다. He is a strong man. 그는 힘센 남자입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A person who is studying at a school or college.
example: I am a student.
koChirpScript: student. 학생이라는 뜻입니다. I am a student. 저는 학생입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: The devotion of time and attention to acquiring knowledge on an academic subject; to devote time and attention to acquiring knowledge.
example: I need to study for my exam.
koChirpScript: study. 공부라는 명사와 공부하다라는 동사로 쓰입니다. I need to study for my exam. 시험공부를 해야 해요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A manner of doing something.
example: I like your style.
koChirpScript: style. 스타일 또는 방식이라는 뜻입니다. I like your style. 당신의 스타일이 마음에 들어요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A branch of knowledge studied or taught in a school, college, or university.
example: What's your favorite subject?
koChirpScript: subject. 과목 또는 주제라는 뜻입니다. What's your favorite subject? 가장 좋아하는 과목이 뭐예요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: The accomplishment of an aim or purpose.
example: Hard work is the key to success.
koChirpScript: success. 성공이라는 뜻입니다. Hard work is the key to success. 노력은 성공의 열쇠입니다. 라는 의미네요.

definition: A sweet crystalline substance obtained from various plants, especially sugar cane and sugar beet, consisting essentially of sucrose, and used as a sweetener in food and drink.
example: Do you take sugar in your coffee?
koChirpScript: sugar. 설탕이라는 뜻입니다. Do you take sugar in your coffee? 커피에 설탕 넣으세요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: The warmest season of the year, in the northern hemisphere from June to August and in the southern hemisphere from December to February.
example: I love swimming in the summer.
koChirpScript: summer. 여름이라는 뜻입니다. I love swimming in the summer. 저는 여름에 수영하는 것을 좋아해요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: The star around which the earth orbits.
example: The sun is shining brightly.
koChirpScript: sun. 태양 또는 해라는 뜻입니다. The sun is shining brightly. 해가 밝게 빛나고 있어요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: The day of the week before Monday and following Saturday, observed by Christians as a day of rest and worship.
example: What are you doing on Sunday?
koChirpScript: Sunday. 일요일이라는 뜻입니다. What are you doing on Sunday? 일요일에 뭐 하세요? 라는 의미네요.

definition: A large self-service store selling groceries and household goods.
example: I need to go to the supermarket.
koChirpScript: supermarket. 슈퍼마켓이라는 뜻입니다. I need to go to the supermarket. 슈퍼마켓에 가야 해요. 라는 의미네요.

definition: Completely confident that one is right.
example: Are you sure about that?
koChirpScript: sure. 확신하는이라는 뜻입니다. Are you sure about that? 그것에 대해 확신하세요? 라는 의미네요.
